nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
Based on openzeppelin tag v1.10.0 commit: feb665136c0dae9912e08397c1a21c4af3651ef3
Modifications:
1) Added pauser role, switched pause/unpause to be onlyPauser (6/14/2018)
2) Removed whenNotPause/whenPaused from pause/unpause (6/14/2018)
3) Removed whenPaused (6/14/2018)
4) Switches ownable library to use zeppelinos (7/12/18)
5) Remove constructor (7/13/18)
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev throws if called by any account other than the pauser
nodes.name: onlyPauser

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation: @dev update the pauser role
nodes.name: updatePauser

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
Based on openzeppelin tag v1.10.0 commit: feb665136c0dae9912e08397c1a21c4af3651ef3
Modifications:
1) Added pauser role, switched pause/unpause to be onlyPauser (6/14/2018)
2) Removed whenNotPause/whenPaused from pause/unpause (6/14/2018)
3) Removed whenPaused (6/14/2018)
4) Switches ownable library to use zeppelinos (7/12/18)
5) Remove constructor (7/13/18)
